div.p: ... the key of your wall cupboard, if of course it is there inside, otherwise, wherever it is \/, let me know. For I shall not have anyone else who can reliably bring it to Alexandria for me. Therefore, do not neglect, if you have decided to stay for the festival at your place, send Tsenkomon to me. Heraklas troubled us... Translation: N. Litinas, CdE 93 (2018) 147
